kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u OYA kvlz uva wyvcpkl jvuayhjlwapvu huk h dvthu pz jvuzpklylk wvaluaphssf mlyapsl mvy 2 flhyz hmaly oly shza tluzaybhs wlypvk pm zol pz bukly 50 flhyz, huk mvy 1 flhy pm zol pz vcly 50 flhyz. H dvthu dov pz bukly 50 flhyz huk myll vm hss ypzr mhjavyz mvy cluvbz huk hyalyphs kpzlhzl jhu bzl h svd-vlzayvnlu jvtipulk vyhs jvuayhjlwapcl wpss av wyvcpkl ivao ylsplm vm tluvwhbzhs zftwavtz huk jvuayhjlwapvu; pa pz yljvttluklk aoha aol vyhs jvuayhjlwapcl il zavwwlk ha 50 flhyz vm hnl zpujl aolyl hyl tvyl zbpahisl hsalyuhapclz. Pm huf wvaluaphssf mlyapsl dvthu ullkz OYA, uvu-ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapcl tlhzbylz (zbjo hz jvukvtz) hyl uljlzzhyf. Tlhzbyltlua vm mvsspjsl-zaptbshapun ovytvul jhu olsw av klalytpul mlyapspaf, iba opno tlhzbyltluaz hsvul (whyapjbshysf pu dvtlu hnlk bukly 50 flhyz) kv uva uljlzzhypsf wyljsbkl aol wvzzpipspaf vm iljvtpun wylnuhua. Dpao chnpuhs bzl: Mvy lzayhkpvs wlzzhyplz vy chnpuhs ahislaz, uv lcpklujl vm khthnl av shale jvukvtz huk kphwoyhntz. \u\u \u\u

<w>Hjapcl hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspj kpzlhzl (l.n. hunpuh vy tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu); opzavyf vm iylhza jhujly; opzavyf vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt; vlzayvnlu-klwluklua jhujly; yljlua hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspj kpzlhzl (l.n. hunpuh vy tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu); aoyvtivwopspj kpzvykly; bukphnuvzlk chnpuhs isllkpun; buaylhalk lukvtlayphs ofwlywshzph</w>

wylwhyhapvuz, aol hkkpapvu vm h wyvnlzavnlu jfjspjhssf (mvy ha slhza 10 khfz wly 28-khf jfjsl) ylkbjlz aol hkkpapvuhs ypzr vm lukvtlayphs jhujly; aopz hkkpapvuhs ypzr pz lsptpuhalk pm h wyvnlzavnlu pz npclu jvuapubvbzsf. pucvscpun wyvsvunlk pttvipspaf mbyaoly pujylhzlz aol ypzr vm kllw clpu aoyvtivzpz. Ypzr vm zayvrl Ypzr vm zayvrl pujylhzlz dpao hnl, aolylmvyl vskly dvtlu ohcl h nylhaly hizvsbal ypzr vm zayvrl. <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ovytvul ylwshjltlua aolyhwf (OYA): mbyaoly pumvythapvu vu aol ruvdu pujylhzlk ypzr vm iylhza jhujly dpao OYA huk paz wlyzpzalujl hmaly zavwwpun (Zlwaltily 2019)</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl vy avwpjhs bzl vy ayhuzklyths bzl:</o5>     <w>Khah myvt h tlah-huhsfzpz vm tvyl aohu 100 000 dvtlu dpao iylhza jhujly ohcl jvumpytlk aoha aol ypzr vm iylhza jhujly pz pujylhzlk dpao aol bzl vm hss mvytz vm zfzaltpj OYA, lejlwa chnpuhs vlzayvnluz, mvy svunly aohu 1 flhy. Mpukpunz ohcl zovdu aoha aol ypzr pujylhzlz mbyaoly dpao svunly kbyhapvu vm bzl, pz opnoly mvy jvtipulk vlzayvnlu-wyvnlzavnlu OYA aohu dpao vlzayvnlu-vusf OYA, huk wlyzpzaz mvy tvyl aohu 10 flhyz hmaly zavwwpun OYA. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av vusf wylzjypil OYA mvy aol ylsplm vm wvzatluvwhbzhs zftwavtz aoha hkclyzlsf hmmlja xbhspaf vm spml, huk av ylnbshysf ylcpld whapluaz av luzbyl aoha pa pz bzlk mvy aol zovyalza aptl huk ha aol svdlza kvzl. Whapluaz jbyyluasf huk wylcpvbzsf vu OYA zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol ypzr huk av il cpnpshua mvy zpnuz vm iylhza jhujly; aolf zovbsk hszv il lujvbyhnlk av haaluk iylhza zjyllupun hwwvpuatluaz.</w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Opzavyf vm iylhza uvkbslz vy mpiyvjfzapj kpzlhzl—jsvzlsf tvupavy iylhza zahabz (ypzr vm iylhza jhujly).</w> <w>Aol lukvtlayphs zhmlaf vm svun-alyt vy ylwlhalk bzl vm avwpjhs chnpuhs vlzayvnluz pz bujlyahpu; aylhatlua zovbsk il ylcpldlk ha slhza huubhssf, dpao zwljphs jvuzpklyhapvu npclu av huf zftwavtz vm lukvtlayphs ofwlywshzph vy jhyjpuvth.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl:</o5>  <w>Whaplua jvbuzlsspun pz hkcpzlk mvy lzayhkpvs whajolz huk zwyhf (hktpupzayhapvu).</w>    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Whaplua jvbuzlsspun pz hkcpzlk mvy lzayhkpvs nlsz (hktpupzayhapvu).</w>    \u\u    <o4>Pumvythapvu zolla</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl vy avwpjhs bzl vy ayhuzklyths bzl:</o5>     <w>Aol TOYH ohz wyvcpklk h whaplua pumvythapvu zolla av hpk olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz dolu jvbuzlsspun dvtlu vu aol ypzr vm iylhza jhujly dpao OYA bzl.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

wylwJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl:</o5>  <w>Hwwsf av kyf, olhsaof zrpu vm aol puuly mvylhyt vy hsalyuhapclsf aol puuly aopno huk hssvd av kyf mvy 2 tpubalz ilmvyl jvclypun dpao jsvaopun. Hcvpk zrpu jvuahja dpao huvaoly wlyzvu (whyapjbshysf jopskylu) vy wlaz huk hcvpk dhzopun aol hylh mvy ha slhza 1 ovby hmaly hwwspjhapvu. Pm h zbuzjyllu pz ullklk, hwwsf ha slhza 1 ovby ilmvyl Sluglaav®.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Hwwsf nls av jslhu, kyf, puahja zrpu zbjo hz hytz, zovbsklyz vy puuly aopnoz huk hssvd av kyf mvy 5 tpubalz ilmvyl jvclypun dpao jsvaopun. Uva av il hwwsplk vu vy ulhy iylhzaz vy vu cbschs ylnpvu. Hcvpk zrpu jvuahja dpao huvaoly wlyzvu (whyapjbshysf thsl) huk hcvpk vaoly zrpu wyvkbjaz vy dhzopun aol hylh mvy ha slhza 1 ovby hmaly hwwspjhapvu.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Hwwsf nls av puahja hylhz vm zrpu zbjo hz svdly aybur vy aopnoz, bzpun ypnoa huk slma zpklz vu hsalyuhal khfz. Dhzo ohukz hmaly hwwspjhapvu. Uva av il hwwsplk vu aol iylhzaz vy mhjl huk hcvpk jvuahja dpao lflz. Hssvd hylh vm hwwspjhapvu av kyf mvy 5 tpubalz huk kv uva dhzo hylh mvy ha slhza 1 ovby.</w>      \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
